titles: Wealth discovered: or, An essay upon a late expedient for taking away all impositions and raising a revenue without taxes. Published, and presented to his most excellent Majesty, King Charles the II. By F.C. a lover of his countrey. Whereunto is added his Majesties gracious order.
author: Cradocke, Francis, d. 1670?
publisher: printed by E.C. for A. Seile over against St. Dunstans Church in Fleet-street,
notes: Dedication and preface signed: Fran. Cradocke.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Banks and banking --  England --  Early works to 1800.
